name: The Deep Dive Adventure
description: It is said that 80 per cent of the ocean is unexplored. What’s hidden in it’s depths? What kind of creatures and monsters inhabit the very bottom of the sea? Is it wise to try and find out and how will the ocean change YOU?  Attempt to answer these questions as you, a meager fish in this vast world, descent deeper and deeper, evolve along the way and… Perhaps, you’ll even survive. However, will you remain yourself? Now that is a completely different question…   Controls   Use the WASD or the arrow keys to control the fish.  Beware of those that are larger than yourself and the radioactive waste as well.
